entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
